ygData.msgSnippet: The blast slamming into Motormaster is to much for even his armored hide as he is flung back, his entire form smoking from the energy output. As he drifts back

Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The blast slamming into Motormaster is to much for even his armored hide as
he is flung back, his entire form smoking from the energy output. As he
drifts back and tries to look up to see his target he has problems because
of the smoke. "Ill get you for that" he screams, shooting randomly to hit a
target.
